name: sand3d (beta)
description:
sand3d is a 3d sand falling game. Inspired by 2d sand falling games like "the powder toy" or "sandspiel".

Currently this is the first beta of the game, with no UI, sound, settings, nothing. It's just the bare minimum of what the game could be. I was able to finish this a month ago but due to school wasn't able to upload.

It would be extremely helpful if you can leave some feedback on the game. Anything will do whether its glitches you found, gameplay improvement, or elements you would like!

Controls

ESC to leave game

WASD to move

QE to strafe up and down (not really needed but it's there anyway :P)

Shift to speed up movement

Mouse to rotate

Right Click to place elements

Left Click to delete elements

Choose element using keys 0-9

1 - sand

2 - water

3 - rock

4 - electricity

5 - wire

6 - LED

7 - smoke

8 - fire

9 - wood

10 - gunpowder
